cells.text: The statutory income tax rate of 25.9% (2012 – 25.5%) increased due to changes in Capstone's allocation of provincial taxable income.
cells.text_vi: Thuế suất thuế thu nhập theo luật định 25,9% (2012 - 25,5%) tăng do những thay đổi trong phân bổ thu nhập chịu thuế của Capstone.

cells.text: Current income taxes payable of $2,581 are included in accounts payable and other liabilities on the statement of financial position (see note 17(a)).
